video.title: Liv and Maddie
video.synopsis: After four years in Hollywood as a television star, Liv returns to Wisconsin to discover that either she -- or her family -- has changed.

episodes.synopsis: Liv's plan to find Maddie a date for the school dance backfires, angering her twin. Meanwhile, Joey and Parker's antics annoy Liv.
episodes.title: Twin-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: As the new captain of the basketball team, Maddie protests when the principal cuts their budget, but the rest of the team doesn't have her back.
episodes.title: Team-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Liv wants to bond with her younger brother, Parker, so she volunteers to host his sleepover party -- but has no idea what she's getting into.
episodes.title: Sleep-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Maddie's been busy with the basketball team, and Liv decides she needs to make other friends -- but her new pal isn't the best influence.
episodes.title: Steal-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: At the Halloween dance, Maddie tries to help Joey get over his fear of talking to girls, but things don't go quite as planned.
episodes.title: Kang-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Liv is supposed to judge a skateboarding competition that her boyfriend is skating in, but when he breaks up with her, she wants to back out.
episodes.title: Skate-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: While doing community service at a senior center, Liv and Maddie butt heads -- and decide to settle their differences with a game of dodgeball.
episodes.title: Dodge-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Liv wants to prove that she's smart, so she persuades Joey to let her join his Brain Olympics team, but he won't listen to her ideas.
episodes.title: Brain-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: To celebrate their Sweet 16, Liv plans a surprise party for Maddie. But a misunderstanding threatens to spoil the fun.
episodes.title: Sweet 16-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Liv is invited to sing at the town's annual holiday spectacular, but her young duet partner tries to steal the spotlight.
episodes.title: Fa-La-La A Rooney

episodes.synopsis: After Maddie fails her driver's test, Liv offers to switch places with her and give it a try -- but they forget about one very important detail.
episodes.title: Switch-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Maddie and Pete partner up for a two-on-two basketball tournament, but Maddie ditches him for Joey's personal trainer to get a better shot at winning.
episodes.title: Dump-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: When the house is invaded by beetles, the family needs to leave town -- but a misunderstanding makes the kids think they're moving permanently.
episodes.title: Move-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Willow's crush on Joey is making it hard for her to focus on softball tryouts. Meanwhile, Liv gets into a sticky situation before a TV appearance.
episodes.title: Slump-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Liv is jealous of Maddie and Karen's mother-daughter weekend plans, so she invites her TV show mom, Bree, to crash their outing.
episodes.title: Moms-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Liv's plans to help her twin express her girly side work a little too well when Maddie becomes obsessed with a pair of high heels.
episodes.title: Shoe-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Liv tries to get into character when she's up for a role as a werewolf. Meanwhile, Diggie wants to take break-dancing lessons with Maddie.
episodes.title: Howl-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Maddie is hoping she'll get the chance to try out for the Junior Olympics basketball team, but Liv is afraid of Maddie leaving her.
episodes.title: Flashback-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: When Liv's best friend visits, Maddie thinks Diggie is flirting with her. Meanwhile, Karen feels insecure when she meets Pete's ex-girlfriend.
episodes.title: BFF-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Liv's music video becomes a big hit -- but not because of her talent. Meanwhile, Diggie hires Maddie to work at the yogurt shop.
episodes.title: Song-A-Rooney

episodes.synopsis: Liv begins shooting "Space Werewolves," and she wants to do her own stunts to prove she's a great actress -- but she's totally freaked out.
episodes.title: Space-Werewolf-A-Rooney
